Package server

Class QuizFileManager

java.lang.Object
server.QuizFileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class QuizFileManager extends Object implements Manager
Reads and writes files with quiz information for initialization and storage

Contains an ArrayList of quizzes from storage that will be passed to QuizManager.

Version:
11/14/21
Author:
Daniel Geva
See Also:
QuizManager, FileWrapper
